name: Soul Yank
description:
This game was made for Global Game Jam 22. 
And it not ready at all :D

Originally there were meant to be 5 or more levels. 
Few days before jam end we created 4 level prototypes. But Only first two was made playable. And not finished too. 

So you got the point. 

The game is about sculptor that fell in love with own creation and was trying to find the way to make it alive. Player should go through different adventures to help him achieve the goal. And find out if it was worth it. 

Main plot was inspired with ancient Greece legend with the same beginning.

Main game mechanic is to fight with enemies, take their souls and use it to make any objects alive. Player should use this objects to solve puzzles and go through the levels. 

This part left behind the scene. We didn't manage to make it playable yet.
